entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 2:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon then becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
